content.rendered:
To better capitalise on its natural resources, Benin decided to expand the Sèmè-Kraké oil field.

As part of the offshore project, Geocean used the Geocean Protis barge to carry out a variety of operations, including installation of a 220-tonne CSP (Conductor Supported Platform), laying of three pipelines (production, export, treated water discharge) and construction of a CBM (Conventional Buoy Mooring) type export terminal.

excerpt.rendered: The Geocean Protis barge was employed to deliver a turnkey solution for the offshore oil field in Benin.
